metadata.region: Las Vegas, NV Metro (including Henderson, North Las Vegas, Boulder City)
metadata.methodology: LinkedIn research via Google, facility website scraping, NVHCA directory. Apollo API unavailable (requires paid plan). Email patterns generated from verified MX domains + common corporate patterns. All LinkedIn profiles verified via Google search results.
metadata.emailConfidenceNote: Emails marked 'pattern-high' use firstname.lastname@domain format with MX-verified domains (corporate email servers confirmed). Emails marked 'pattern-medium' use less certain patterns. All LinkedIn URLs are verified from Google search index.
metadata.apolloStatus: BLOCKED - api/v1/people/match requires paid Apollo plan. Recommend upgrading for bulk email verification.
metadata.enrichmentSource: Google LinkedIn search, facility websites, NVHCA directory

topPriorityTargets.lead: Frances Showa - Area Director of Operations, Culinary Services Group
topPriorityTargets.reason: MULTI-FACILITY CONTACT: One relationship opens doors to multiple senior living placements. Area-level food service decision maker.
topPriorityTargets.action: Connect on LinkedIn, personalized InMail about smart market amenity for staff break rooms

topPriorityTargets.lead: Christina Perez - ED, Pacifica Senior Living San Martin
topPriorityTargets.reason: Multi-level care facility (AL+IL+MC) with clubhouse. Pacifica manages Green Valley location too = 2 placements.
topPriorityTargets.action: Gift basket drop-off at 8374 W Capovilla Ave; mention staff amenity for CNAs working long shifts

topPriorityTargets.lead: Paul Ortega - ED, MorningStar at The Canyons
topPriorityTargets.reason: 3,700+ LinkedIn followers = well-connected industry leader. MorningStar is expanding (hiring in Henderson too).
topPriorityTargets.action: LinkedIn connect + in-person visit at 490 S Hualapai Way

topPriorityTargets.reason: Largest US senior living operator; AL + Nursing/Rehab = heavy staffing. Standardized vendor process once you're in.
topPriorityTargets.action: Call 3025 E Russell Rd, ask for administrator. Brookdale has corporate vendor programs.

topPriorityTargets.lead: Advanced Health Care chain (4 LV-area locations)
topPriorityTargets.reason: 4 SNF locations in LV metro = potential for 4 placements through one corporate relationship.
topPriorityTargets.action: Identify regional manager; approach corporate for multi-site vendor agreement

emailPatternGuide.note: All domains have verified MX records confirming active email servers. Patterns based on most common corporate email format (firstname.lastname@domain). Recommend verifying with Hunter.io or ZeroBounce before cold outreach.
